|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Spansion;FL032PIF; |flash1size = 4 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 32 |ram1chip = ESMT;M13S2561616A-5T; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->

|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vac = 100-240 |pwr_ac_hz = 50/60 |pwr_amp_ac = 0.3 |pwr_conn = NEMA 1-15P

|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = <!-- flags, Leave blank for none --> |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = bgn

|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1txchains = 1 |rad1rxchains = 1 |rad1sstreams = 1 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 150 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "CA-F121", "1301172750-1.0", and "Rev:1.1sp1" :is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. :.. The device is also shown as using AR9341 :(AR9341-AL1A) despite being a 1T1R device...
Additional specifications, per '''TP-LINK''''s datasheet, follow... *Power Consumption: about 3W *EIRP: < 20 dBm *Receive Sensitivity **130M: -68 dBm @ 10% PER **108M: -68 dBm @ 10% PER **54M: -68 dBm @ 10% PER **11M: -85 dBm @ 8% PER **6M: -88 dBm @ 10% PER **1M: -90 dBm @ 8% PER *Dimensions (W x D x H): [[Dimensions::110 mm x 65.8 mm x 75.2 mm]]
Default settings (including the SSID) are per the FCC and '''TP-LINK''''s manual.
[[Category:English Documentation]]
